page.title: 13CAMP SITES
page.content:
CAMP SITES
The village is much favoured by summer campers both in caravans and tents and the population is greatly increased in the summer months by these visitors. There are four commercial sites at Gibralter Farm, Bottoms Farm, Far Arnside and at Holgates site off Cove Road. Holgates is the largest and like Far Arnside has a high proportion of large, static caravans. There are also permanent camp-sites for both Scouts and Guides at Silverhelme and Silver Sapling respectively. The former is in the middle of the Row and the latter close to the National Trust car-park to Eaves Wood.
